entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Temperature steady near 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature falling to plus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. High 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of showers. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 18.
